com.rivelbop.rivelworks.input

Class InputManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputMultiplexer
      • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.input.InputManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class InputManager
extends com.badlogic.gdx.InputMultiplexer
    Handles multi-input support, allowing the user to easily customize in-game controls.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  InputManager.InputMap
      Controls both the input for desktop and controllers.

      Stores the input map for each game pad and player.
